mapper.insert:
insert into Admin
id,
id_num,
name,
phone,
mail,
password,
gender,
token,
expired_date,
job_num,
location,
employer,
doc_url,

mapper.select: select id, id_num, name, phone, mail, password, gender, token, expired_date, job_num, location, employer, doc_url from admin where token = #{token,jdbcType=CHAR}
select id, id_num, name, phone, mail, password, gender, token, expired_date, job_num, location, employer, doc_url from admin where phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, id_num, name, phone, mail, password, gender, token, expired_date, job_num, location, employer, doc_url from admin where id_num = #{idNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, id_num, name, phone, mail, password, gender, token, expired_date, job_num, location, employer, doc_url from admin where mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update admin
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id_num = #{idNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT},
token = #{token,jdbcType=CHAR},
expired_date = #{expiredDate,jdbcType=DATE},
job_num = #{jobNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employer = #{employer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doc_url = #{docUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, id_num, name, phone, mail, password, gender, token, expired_date, job_num, location, employer, doc_url from admin where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
